mapper.insert: insert into entry_register (register_id, material_id, register_pic_url, register_pass_status) values (#{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerPassStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select register_id, material_id, register_pic_url, register_pass_status from entry_register
